solution_line_template: First find out how much he earned just from puppy washing: ${total_earned} - ${daily_base_pay} = $<<{total_earned}-{daily_base_pay}={earned_from_puppies}>>{earned_from_puppies} for puppy washing
Now divide this amount by the payment per puppy: ${earned_from_puppies} / ${pay_per_puppy} per puppy = <<{earned_from_puppies}/{pay_per_puppy}={num_puppies}>>{num_puppies} puppies
